text: The Symphony No. 4 in A major, Op. 90 is an orchestral work by Felix Mendelssohn. He gave the nickname Italian to the symphony. It premiered in London on 13 March 1833. ==References== * Woodstra, Chris, et. al. 2005. All Music Guide to Classical Music. All Media Guide, LLC. p. 822\. . Category:Compositions by Felix Mendelssohn Mendelssohn No 4 Category:Compositions in A major
title: Symphony No. 4 (Mendelssohn)
